examples.text: Arkada覺m, bu anlamaya ben imza atmad覺m. Beni balamaz.
examples.translation: My buddy, I haven't signed this agreement. It does not bind me.

examples.text: "(nce) Deveni bala, ondan sonra Allah'a tevekk羹l et."
examples.translation: "(First) Tie your camel, then submit to God.

examples.text: Hostes, inie ge癟mek 羹zere olduumuzu ve kemerlerimizi balamam覺z覺 anons etti.
examples.translation: [A/The] stewardess announced that we are going to land and that we fasten our seat belts.

examples.text: Telefonu balarsa g繹r羹羹p i癟imi d繹keceim.
examples.translation: If [he/she/it] puts through, I will talk to (him/her/it/them) and open me.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish 堥塈媞塈 (balamak), from older Turkic languages, compare Old Turkic  (ba纂la). Equivalent to ba + -la.
